content:
Sure thing! Here are some restaurant suggestions in the Holborn area with a lively atmosphere for a group of friends:

1. Cigalon - A French restaurant with a garden terrace and a lively bar atmosphere.
2. The Princess Louise - A historic pub with a lively atmosphere and classic British pub food.
3. Scarfes Bar - A bar with a vibrant atmosphere and live music.
4. Piazza Firenze - A lively Italian restaurant with a great atmosphere and live music on weekends.
5. Ping Pong - A dim sum restaurant with a lively, social atmosphere and sharing plates.

Again, it is recommended to check out the menu and prices of each restaurant before making a reservation. Enjoy your dinner with your friends!
